title: Timeless Polki & Emerald Haaram - Jadau Elegance
materials: Fine Color Saturation). Features the signature Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This exquisite haaram features a classic multi-strand design with alternating Polki diamond square and circular clusters. The central pendant showcases a vibrant Zambian Emerald embraced by intricate Polki diamond detailing. The setting highlights the unique character of each Polki diamond, celebrating its natural beauty. Traditional South Indian design aesthetics are blended with a modern minimalist approach.
occasions: or any grand festive occasion. Also suitable for upscale social gatherings and celebratory events.
description: Crafted with authentic Polki diamonds, this haaram is a testament to timeless elegance and traditional Indian craftsmanship. The Zambian Emerald adds a touch of regal sophistication. Its versatile design allows it to be paired with both traditional and contemporary outfits. Represents a valuable heirloom piece to be treasured for generations.
